item.title: Academic Partners
item.description: In Trusted IoT, the research is conducted by 5 parters from Belgium and Germany. Belgian Partners Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB) Name of research group An Braeken KU Leuven Emerging technologies, systems and security Nele Mentens German Partners Brandenburg University of Technology Cottbus-Senftenberg Fachgebiet Technische Informatik Marc Reichenbach Technische Universität Dresden Adaptive Dynamic systems Diana Göhringer Gesellschaft zur Foerderung angewandter Informatik e.V. Frank Püschel
